dimensions.label: Communication Style
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin communicate with others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will communicate clearly and straightforwardly, stating opinions without hesitation or sugar-coating.
Your FarTwin will communicate tactfully and considerately, carefully choosing words to maintain harmony.

dimensions.label: Technical Expertise
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach technology?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be a strong advocate for innovative technologies and digital solutions, often pushing boundaries.
Your FarTwin will approach technology with caution, preferring established methods and evaluating new ideas carefully.

dimensions.label: Social Confidence
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin present themselves to others?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be confident and charismatic, using their charm to build strong relationships.
Your FarTwin will be more reserved, preferring to observe and listen before contributing to conversations.

dimensions.label: Competitive Drive
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach challenges?

options.description: Your FarTwin will tackle challenges with intensity and determination, often taking calculated risks to achieve success.
Your FarTwin will approach challenges with a thoughtful and analytical mindset, prioritizing careful planning over impulsive action.

dimensions.label: Collaborative Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin engage in team environments?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be a collaborative and supportive team player, actively seeking opportunities to help others succeed.
Your FarTwin will approach teamwork with a competitive spirit, striving to outperform and contribute significantly to the team's success.

dimensions.label: Problem-Solving Approach
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin tackle complex problems?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach problems with a methodical and systematic mindset, using data and logic to drive decision-making.
Your FarTwin will tackle problems with a more instinctual approach, relying on their instincts and creative thinking to find innovative solutions.

dimensions.label: Growth Mindset
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin approach learning and self-improvement?

options.description: Your FarTwin will be driven to continually learn and grow, seeking out new challenges and opportunities for self-development.
Your FarTwin will approach learning with a more cautious attitude, preferring to build on existing knowledge and skills rather than taking risks.

dimensions.label: Risk Tolerance
dimensions.description: How will your FarTwin navigate uncertain or high-risk situations?

options.description: Your FarTwin will approach uncertain situations with a sense of excitement and adventure, often taking bold action to capitalize on opportunities.
Your FarTwin will prefer to avoid high-risk situations whenever possible, opting for more predictable and secure approaches.
